item.name: Note
item.note: Note : The upper landing gear doors will close with noise.
Landing gear doors open slowly, when hydraulic system is deactivated.

item.name: Note
item.note: BUS TIE circuit breaker must be out!

item.name: FUEL TRANSFER LEFT and RIGHT

binding.script: UI.click("Fuel Transfer Left on"); UI.click("Fuel Transfer Right on");

item.announce: Fuel Transfer Left Right - both ON check

binding.script: UI.click("Deicing Pitot Left on"); UI.click("Deicing Pitot Right on");

item.name: Cabin Pressure
item.announce: Pressure Controller - set cruise alt check

item.name: Air Conditioning
item.announce: Air Conditioning - Set as required check

item.name: Caution
item.note: Do not press ENGINE OVSPD TEST for more than 20 sec..

item.name: note
item.note: After completion:

item.name: note
item.note: In prolonged idle operation in freezing fog conditions:

item.name: note
item.note: Before takeoff, takeoff and emergency briefing shall be
given to crew members and passengers.

binding.script: UI.click("Fuel Pump 1 on"); UI.click("Fuel Pump 2 on");

item.name: note
item.note: PITOT HEAT, STATIC HEAT and STALL HEAT will
extinguish on annunciator panel, when pitot heat is
activated and as soon as aircraft is airborne.

item.name: note
item.note: Rotation speed should be reduced linearly to 69 KIAS at
1900 kg (4190 lbs) and 66 KIAS at 1600 kg (3530 lbs) takeoff weight.

item.name: Aircraft
item.value: Under MTOW conditions rotate at 71 KIAS

item.name: note
item.note: Recommended cruise climb speed is 120 KIAS while
maximum climb speed is 110 KIAS.

item.name: note
item.note: Maximum allowed fuel unbalance is 106 l(28 U.S. Gallons).

item.name: note
item.note: Flap selection airspeed must be below 120 KIAS for flaps
setting to 15 degC and below 109 KIAS for flap setting to 30 degC.

item.name: note
item.note: If differential pressure still is indicated:

item.name: note
item.note: After touchdown, wheels on ground:

item.name: note
item.note: When clear of runway:

item.name: note
item.note: Approach:

item.name: note
item.note: Crosswind should be compensated by a combination of
heading the nose into the wind and banking the aircraft
slightly into the wind.

item.name: note
item.note: Prior to touchdown:

item.name: Aircraft
item.value: Adjust to center line of runway

item.name: note
item.note: After touchdown:

item.name: note
item.note: Aircraft flight characteristics do not change when flying in
rain. However, the stall speeds will be 3 to 5 knots higher
than the given ones.
